website_summaries.verdict: Dual-layer mesh lets sand from above filter through without letting sand below the blanket work its way up.
pros: Dual-layer mesh lets sand filter through top and away from sitting surface
Folds into a small carry bag
Easy to wipe, wash, and dry
cons: Manufacturer recommends pairing with a beach towel for additional comfort sitting or lying down

customer_reviews.title: I loved this beach mat
customer_reviews.text: I loved this beach mat. I read through the reviews and was a little worried that is wasn't going to work. I will agree that some of the bigger rocks in the sand tended to stay on the top of the mat but that didn't bother me. The main reason I got it was to help keep the sand off me and my stuff and it worked perfect for that. I believe it is a must have when going to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Sara BehmerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: it's easy to get the sand off when ready to leave ...
customer_reviews.text: sand just comes up through the mat when you sit on it... it's easy to get the sand off when ready to leave but it will not prevent you from getting sandy yourself. Update: Very good seller, updating to 4 stars because they gave me a refund without asking. This mesh mat is great if you're looking for something that won't bring sand with you back from the beach. It just won't prevent sand from getting on you while sitting on it.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Wait, the sand comes up from the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so it never occurred to me that if the sand can go past the blanket that it can also come up. I originally was going to place the blanket outside my tent to have people wipe before coming in. Well that was a no-go. When I laid the blanket down the sand came up. So instead I used it in my tent and placed it on my tents floor. Luckily that worked like a charm, I never got sand on my inflatable bed because all the sand would come off when people walked on the sand.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette

customer_reviews.title: Not sandless, but sand reduced!
customer_reviews.text: So the mat isn’t “Sandless” as advertised, but it does help keep a lot of the sand away and it’s so easy to knock the sand off that I’m generally satisfied with the product and would recommend if you want a reduction in the amount of sand on you when you’re at the beach. The mat itself is a double mesh layer to let sand easily shake through. It is good for laying down & placing your towels/ bags on top. Is it sandless? No. Is it helpful? Absolutely!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You well deal with sand on you regardless
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this but the sand comes more up then you putting sand on it i think the price is high for this item. It is better then sitting on nothing but with it you'll get sand on you still
customer_reviews.author: Roxy Torres

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and packs easy. Used it in Maui several times
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and packs easy. Used it in Maui several times. Keeps the sand off and easy to shake it out and put back in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: lincbode

customer_reviews.title: Hardly Sand-free.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t call this sand free. The idea is there, but once weight is put on there is sand. My husband and and I were both on it, sand came through and we had sand all over us by the time we got up.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Nice baselayer for towels/blankets
customer_reviews.text: Is this "sand-free"? No. Does it provide a nice foundation for a towel/beach blanket to minimize the sand that would otherwise accumulate on said blanket? Absolutely! My son kept tracking sand onto the mat, but with a quick brush of the hand, it all fell through, minimizing the sand piles on my towel. :) I do think the term "blanket" is misleading... I would NOT sit on this, even with more than a swimsuit on. It's scratchy mesh. Plan on putting something on top of it to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Julie J.

customer_reviews.title: Semi-transparent mesh, if you are wet the sand will ...
customer_reviews.text: Semi-transparent mesh, if you are wet the sand will stick go back up and stick to your body. The stakes are very small and don't really keep the mat on the ground. Not sand-free either.
customer_reviews.author: Ricard

customer_reviews.title: Magically keeps sand away!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but decided to buy this to place in front of a beach tent for a trip to the Outer Banks. We were amazed that we could wipe off our wet, sandy feet before entering the tent, and it actually made the sand disappear. We took this mat out one day with no tent because it was so useful. Towels filled up with sand, but not this mat. It was a great purchase and made our sand time much less sandy! Just anchor it down with the included anchors and it stays in place. If you are going to the beach, you will love this soft, functional mat!
customer_reviews.author: mll123

customer_reviews.title: Cool invention for sand challenged families
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nifty invention! When my family goes to the beach, the sand gets out of control. We have 4 sons and they just get sand alllll over our blanket. At first I tried this by itself, it does remove the sand from the surface, it sifts through the tiny mesh of the blanket. I found I like it also paired with a large sheet, I put this over the sheet. Works good, nice large size. Extra awesome that you give it a shake when packing up and it’s sand free! Then rolls or folds really compact and light!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: WE LOVED IT!
customer_reviews.text: We Loved the Sand Free Beach Mat. This was our second family beach trip with our son. He was too little last year to walk and got sand all in his eyes and everywhere else. But this year we ordered this mat hoping it wouldnt be too "sandy". and it stands by it's claims. Our son can walk now, but the sand was down underneath the mat, so he was able to take naps comfortable and not get sand everywhere. easy to pack up and store. It also came with four stakes to put at the corners of the mat into the ground to keep it in place. Will definitely be purchasing a larger one for next year :)
customer_reviews.author: Caymie Allyn Collier

customer_reviews.title: The material is very rough and not comfortable to sit on
customer_reviews.text: This is only a mesh sheet. Yes sand goes through but it goes both ways so you get covered in sand when you sit on it. The bag it came in fell apart before we could even use it. The material is very rough and not comfortable to sit on. Unfortunately the return window closed by the time we discovered what a bad purchase this was.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Mayo

customer_reviews.title: It Works great, but not how they say
customer_reviews.text: In the Seller's description of "Intimate Service," whatever the heck that is, it says sand falls straight through. That's false. There are two layers and the sand gets trapped between the two layers. A few quick shakes removes the sand when you are ready to leave. It works great, except do not leave it on the sand in rain. The sand clumps and you end up with 100 lbs of trapped sand between the layers. I had to cut one end to get the sand out. The manufacturer should have thought of this and left one end un-sewn. Other than that, it works well. Well enough that I bought a second matt to cover more surface area.
customer_reviews.author: Jager

customer_reviews.title: Not an accurate description
customer_reviews.text: So we ordered this one since it was supposed to be 79x79 inches, but it’s much smaller than that so I am guessing we either got the wrong size and/or the advertisement is false. Buyer beware. With all of that said I think the design and mat itself are great. The one we got would be good for small kids, but not a family.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Pond

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a different material but whatever its made of WORKS... Sands gets on and through but doesn't stay on...I like it. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Godin-caulfield

customer_reviews.title: It keeps the sand off your stuff
customer_reviews.text: Pegs come included to anchor the four corners of the mesh blanket into the sand. Those worked great. The blanket stayed put! Whatever you place on the blanket stays free of sand. I do not recommend laying your body directly on the blanket as it is mesh. This blanket is intended for you to place your towels on. 3 days after we ordered it, we had it on the beach! It kept our towels and tote bag perfectly sand free. It also came with it's own tote bag which made it super convenient to pack. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic mesh and you get sand on you
customer_reviews.text: This item is misleading in the description and photos. While sand does not stick to blanket, it doesn’t keep sand off you because sand comes up from the bottom. It feels like sitting on plastic mesh and gets hit when under the sun. You still need to have a towel or something to keep sand away, so not sure what the purpose of the mat is. Also, pictures show a large family all sitting in the mat which is not accurate since it barely holds 4 adults sitting very closely together, nothing like the photo at all.
customer_reviews.author: narsmith

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: My sister had one of the no sand blankets and I thaught this would be the same but the quality of this one is horrible it’s sighing that the sands from the other side come up! Basically you are sitting in sand. The one my sister had was thicker and perfect the sand would get out but wouldn’t come back up! I would return it but I through out all the papers and stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as it looks
customer_reviews.text: I bought the biggest one here, but it's not that big. Took it to the beach last week, and put two adult beach towels on it and it took up almost the whole thing. Measure it before buying! On the good side, it really does keep sand away from you. I'm not sure how sand sifts out if it, but doesn't sift into it, but it does work. It really just needs to be bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Updated: 06.15.18- I changed the rating to five stars simply because this company worked to resolve the issue. That is better customer service than I have received in a long time. Thank you. My original product review is below as it is still appropriate to the product. But great people to work with at the seller! This is not what I envisioned. Yes, the sand falls right through. But it is so thin that the sand comes up through the bottom. I got more sand on me using this than when I use a standard towel. I am sadly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mowbray

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat!
customer_reviews.text: These beach mat saved my summer. I am a beach lover however, I don’t like that when I put down my blanket, it’s quickly covered with sand. This product solves that pesky problem. It’s so big and I can lay down comfortably without the sand sticking all over me ! Even when we were packing up ... how nice it was not to have sand flying through the air as I wrap up my blanket! This product is a must have for any beach goers.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Vackner

customer_reviews.title: Love it for beach and camping!
customer_reviews.text: I didnt expect much when I ordered this product but it is way better in person then in the photos! Light but thick mesh material. I use it for camping and the beach and cant complain on how it works. I lay it in front of the tent to wipe dirt and sand off my feet to get into my tent. Sand falls right through it at the beach! At the beach sand just falls right through it! Sometimes if there is a steep pile of sand it seeps theough a little but just flatten the sand underneath or lay a towel on top of this mat and youre good!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Rohner

customer_reviews.title: NOT impressed...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the sandy beaches in Florida.... not impressed. The only thing it did was allow the sand to fall through and be able to shake out. When you sit or lay on it, the sand comes up through it and gets everywhere, but easily falls back through when you get up. Still got sand EVERYWHERE!! In me, in my towels, on my drink bottle etc. Does NOT come with pegs to tie down. Had to use my shoes, bag etc to hold down.
customer_reviews.author: CindyB

customer_reviews.title: Beach Needed Item
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to. Its not comfortable to sit directly on. But sand goes right through and not much gets on top unless your walking over it a lot with sandy feet. Def recommend this if going somewhere with sand.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and very functional
customer_reviews.text: Even after reading good reviews I was skeptical whether this would work. But it really does! It works great for a beach day to put a towel on top of it and keeps sand away from towels. It's super light weight as well.
customer_reviews.author: Phoibe

customer_reviews.title: Buy 2 of these for successful use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a cheap sand-free blanket. One isn't thick enough, sand goes right through. But you can either buy a big size and fold it in half (doubling it against the sand) or buy two and double them up that way. Then they work GREAT!--as well as the expensive name-brand ones. If it came doubled, it'd be an easy 5-stars.
customer_reviews.author: Random Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only known sliced bread.... but maybe this is close. Mamas and papas, buy it. I rarely write amazon reviews and I feel compelled as I sit at the beach. Do you tell your kids to not get sand on the bleach blanket (before a JJ Carol which I still love for grass). Do you tell your dogs to, “Get Off!” Introducing this... a few spots of sand here and there that ultimately fall through. And way more compact than other beach/picnic blankets. Changed our beach packing list - but now. - sincerely, non-sponsored mom of a 1yr old and 3yr old who’s stoked about enjoying the beach and not worrying about a sandy snack spot 🙌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T WORK/ seller refunded after refund window
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't work! Sand IMMEDIATELY came up through the holes. Unfortunately, due to Covid, we didn't have a chance to use it until the last day of the return window and now we can't return it for a refund 👎 Edit: I have been contacted by the seller and received a refund for this product. Regardless of my feelings about the product, I would purchase from this seller again. His customer service is great. Thank you👍
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Schreiner

customer_reviews.title: Just as it’s described
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase to leave at our beach house. It’s super convenient with 2 kids! The metal stakes to keep it from blowing away or keeping the kids from tripping over it was great. Product worked jut as it was described. Needed to brush the sand slightly to get it to fall through but nothing like having a towel to have to shake outb
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Gimmick
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money. It's basically a sheet of screen mesh that not only allows sand to sift through from the top but come through from the bottom. Suggest you go to your local hardware store and buy it off the roll instead. Probably cheaper and does the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Dandy Diz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get out and put up!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I took a chance and bought this. Our beach journey was cool and this mesh type blanket helped. The sand didnt really stick it to much when we folded it up to take back home. Putting a towel on top was comfortable and I couldn't feel sand that much underneath me if I sat on the mat.
customer_reviews.author: BP90

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderful but bring a beach towel or something to sit on it will leave lines on your skin
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Best Product if you have little children!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use my towels or beach mats for the beach but with my two small children it is impossible to keep sand off. When I received this product it looks more like a mesh plastic-type cloth which I was hoping for something softer BUTTTTTTT we used it at the beach and it was amazing with the sand AND CRUMBS!!! that the little ones love to make and still comfortable. ** Wet sand does not go through the mesh as easily and definitely need to anchor it becuase the kids will turn it into a ball of mesh as they keep moving.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuela

customer_reviews.title: Sand rests on mat when it’s laying on the beach
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mat for a beach trip and was disappointed. Sand does flow freely through the mat as described however if it’s laying on the beach there is nowhere for the sand to go so it just sits there. It was obvious and I should have thought of that first but I was distracted by the sample video and photos. They must have a hole dug out under the mat in order for that to happen. The only benefit to this is easy cleanup so if that’s what you are looking for then go for it, otherwise I would just bring a larger blanket or another option.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Pillinger

customer_reviews.title: Skip this crappy mesh blanket
customer_reviews.text: This "blanket" is just a few sheets of mesh. So, yes, it doesn't hang on to sand, but also sand just comes up through it. Also the mesh is sparse enough that it's completely uncomfortable to sit directly on. I'd definitely skip this product and buy a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Schrock

customer_reviews.title: Get a larger size
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed the blanket , but it was not large enough. Did not check to see if there was a larger size. It was as advertised the sand did not come through. From the look and feel of the blanket it didn't seem where it would be comfortable, but once laying on it it was quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: pattalley

customer_reviews.title: It’s definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure where all the bad reviews are coming from just used it this past weekend and it worked great! Might be a little better if there was one more layer but this thing worked great! If you live near a beach like I do it’s a must have, thinking about getting a 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome M

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't as big as I thought it would be but was very nice
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Not really sand free
customer_reviews.text: Dry sand will sift through, but wet sand stays. Sand will come back through the mat if you walk on it. Most beaches have little bits of shell in the sand, well that won’t sift through either. However, clean up is easy and use a towel to sit on. It also makes a nice sun shade.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Just Don’t
customer_reviews.text: It does not work at all, still sand all over my beach blanket exactly the same way sand would build up without this thing. It’s basically a thin mesh blanket, now I have no use for it. Just don’t buy this thing, not worth even the low price.
customer_reviews.author: CocoThe Slug

customer_reviews.title: Influencer got me good
customer_reviews.text: I hate this blanket. I was influenced by an influencer who raves about it and in theory it seems great but it isn’t. If you plop it down on the sand and lay on it, all the sand will come up through the holes where there is pressure and get all over you. I still have to lay my towel down on top of it to prevent any sand from getting on me. Buyer beware if you are being recommended this by an influencer!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Way small
customer_reviews.text: While it kept off an abundance of sand there was still a good bit of sand that collected. The mat was supposed to be a79x79 inch mat but was 10 inches short on each side. My sister who is 5 foot 9 couldn’t even lay comfortably on it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% but great anyway
customer_reviews.text: Great for family beach days! Is it 100% sand free? No, but we were a lot better off than having a bunch of sand filled towels at the end of the day. Made for a much cleaner car when we got home.
customer_reviews.author: joana

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have seen these for months and didn't know if it would really be beneficial. I finally gave in and was so happy I did. It came with a bag and stakes to transport and secure it. I cant wait to test it out. It will be perfect for keeping the sand off my towels and actually make going to beach a little more enjoyable!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great beach blanket because no sand stays on it because ...
customer_reviews.text: Great beach blanket because no sand stays on it because it's netted!! But if you're looking for coverage to wear you can keep sand off of you, your clothes or picnic area, this is NOT the blanket for you!!
customer_reviews.author: Lilaay

customer_reviews.title: Sand is everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I don’t get it? I thought it was supposed to be used to lay on so you don’t get sandy.. the sand does fall threw if you sprinkle it, but if your walking or it is more than a handful it does not. It also will come up if your sitting on it. I may have had the wrong impression but I thought you could use it instead of a towel.. disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: By itself really isn't that useful
customer_reviews.text: Let's as much sand through the bottom and it let's back down...the concept works well but you're going to have to put something down underneath it to keep the sand from coming up and then put this over the top of it. Which means you have to carry a big Beach blanket how long with it
customer_reviews.author: kodiek

customer_reviews.title: No balls in sand
customer_reviews.text: The beach is hot and smelly. Dead fish, sea turtles, manatees and dolphins all over. At least no sand on my naughty parts.
customer_reviews.author: nate

customer_reviews.title: This product did not hold the sand
customer_reviews.text: We were disappointed in this product. It is did not keep sand under the blanket as advertised. Sand was able to work its way up though the mesh. It provide some protection, but our family did not find it protected us as the advertising shows. Unfortunately, we could not return the blanket because we did not get to test it before the return window closed.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for the beach
customer_reviews.text: This is not to sit on but to be a barrier between your blanket or towel on the beach. The sand filters perfectly through blanket to kept your stuff mostly sand free. This was one of those... "Why not impulse buys" .. but it turned out quite well and great addition to our beach gear.
customer_reviews.author: zdoug

customer_reviews.title: USELESS
customer_reviews.text: Useless. It’s just a mesh blanket. Sand gets on you from being on it. Only thing it does is that when you pick it up to pack your things, the sand falls right through it so you don’t have to shake it off.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Parker

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sand Blanket
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is easy to use and stays put in the sand with the provided corner stakes. This item held up well after multiple days of use. Sand can transfer both ways, so using a towel on top when sitting on it is best.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: not what I though. I thought it would be a nice barrier , and then if sand gets on it it will go though. You better off with a beach blanket or town.
customer_reviews.author: Rian Alvis

customer_reviews.title: Best mat
customer_reviews.text: Best mat ever. My toddler has a sensory issue where she hates sand, like even a pebble. So we put this down and then a blanket for her. It shakes clean. Our stuff is never covered in sand. Wish I had one as a kid!
customer_reviews.author: Robin e engel

customer_reviews.title: Good if you aren't around water, sand, dirt....
customer_reviews.text: well I unfolded it and its just sheer material that looks like my shower loofah. The problem, lay it down and the sand comes up onto the mat. The second major problem, its horrible if it gets wet. It turns everything into a mud clump. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Felt like I was literally laying on sand, don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This mat does what is says, it keeps the same off. But the sand sifts through both ways. So when I lay on the mat, I fee like I’m just laying on sand. Very uncomfortable. I wouldn’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Timbo Slice

customer_reviews.title: The sand was a little coarse so it didn't all disappear/ fall through when some got on the blanket but none came through from the bottom when we sat on it which was really nice. The blanket stayed in place securely with the ...
customer_reviews.text: The beach mat blanket worked well for our beach vacation. The sand was a little coarse so it didn't all disappear/ fall through when some got on the blanket but none came through from the bottom when we sat on it which was really nice. The blanket stayed in place securely with the stakes provided. I agree with what others said about using a towel when you sit on it, it just makes it more comfortable. Overall I feel it was a good purchase to help keep things more sand free!
customer_reviews.author: jared freiburger

customer_reviews.title: An awesome beach mat that could have many other uses!
customer_reviews.text: If you hate having sand everywhere after a trip to the beach, this is for you. It's super simple but works wonders. Basically it's high grade netting that is comfy to walk on that sand slips right through. It is perfect for the beach but it could have so many practical applications. I told my husband I want to order another one to hang in my green house for a nice durable shade cloth 😅
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Cole

customer_reviews.title: Quality beach blanket
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet, however, having grown up at the beach, the product looks sturdy & easy of use. Always a pain trying to knock back the excessive sand when packing up. Would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: steven jonas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anyone
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i wanted/needed for my families first beach vacation! As the adults had chairs this is perfect for the kids to sit on and eat and what not when not playing in the ocean!!! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is hard to beat for the price. I knew it wasn't the name brand, but very happy with how it works. Dry sand filters through, but wet sand does not. I wouldn't expect it to. Perfect for the 2 yr old Granddaughter who is on and off it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay G.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is cool. I hate getting sand in my car. Thanks to this, the sand transfer was minimal this morning.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a beach vacation and it has been perfect. I was looking for a cheaper alternative to a more expensive brand and am so happy I came across this one. The size is great for my family of 5. The sand falls through and our towels don't get all sandy. I washed it after the first few days bc my sister's dog drooled all over it, and it is still perfect. Folds up small and is light weight. Would love to see in other bright colors. Plan to use for camping trips also. I had several people comment on it and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Efficient product
customer_reviews.text: It does keep the beach sand away as described and helps the towels from gathering sticky or running sand! I should have bought the larger or two. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for our baby. It's great because it let's people know how much space is yours at the beach and we put a baby pool on top of it and my daughter loved climbing in and out of the pool without getting all sandy.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra yates

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt work at all!! there was sand on this thing while we were just setting it up. Dont buy
customer_reviews.author: James Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Keeps beach towels cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This beach mat was perfect for our trip to FL. It is very light weight, fits in the small drawstring bag and kept our towels from getting all sandy.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Must be very fine, perfectly smooth sand.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for sand, but if you've ever actually been to the beach, you know the sand isn't all just tiny grains. There are A LOT of small shells and whatnot that make up sand (at least in the Outer Banks) and they don't go through so you end up having to shake it off like a regular towel/blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great beach blanket
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our trip to Bermuda beaches and it worked great. Much larger than I expected. It came with metal stakes, but we just put our shoes and towels on the corners of the blanket to keep it in place. It is water-resistant and the sand from the beach was easy to shake off when it was time to put it away. You don't really have to fold it to put it back into the bag, you can just roll it up and push it into the carry bag (which is attached), making it easy to pack up and go~
customer_reviews.author: Chase Davis

customer_reviews.title: You’ll love it !
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet but it’s nice and big and I like that it came with hooks and little plastic screws to put in sand ! Excited to use it !
customer_reviews.author: Rozy288

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but bought it for our beach trip. Even my husband complimented me on this purchase. It wasn’t 100% but did save our family from eating sand for lunch (like we did the previous day when we forgot the blanket). It’s mesh - so the sand falls right through. It dries quickly and doesn’t bring sand home. Comes with a convenient bag as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Foushee

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: It was awful more sand on us then sitting on a towel! Trying to get a refund. I left a one Star to this product before. Although the product didn't work well for my family and I the customer service was great and fully refunded me.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Functional but coarse.
customer_reviews.text: This mat is larger and does what it says it does. But the texture is a bit coarse, it's not pleasant on elbows and you still have to slightly lift and shake the blanket to get the sand to soft through.
customer_reviews.author: JonnyPrime and Sparkles

customer_reviews.title: Product is ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: Yes , the product does allow sand to fall through , but the problem is that the sand comes through the blanket from the bottom making you completely sandy..it was a nice try , needs improvement on the design. I give it 3 stars for quick delivery , and partially working..deff wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: Richard K.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars, I would. It's like sitting on a piece of mesh. Sand comes right up through it. The only redeeming quality is that the sand doesn't stick to it when it's time to fold it up and put it away.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Sollars

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at the beach last week. Wish I would have gotten the larger one though.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki Ridgeway

customer_reviews.title: Keeps most of the sand at bay
customer_reviews.text: The mat does a good job of stopping most of the sand, on the fine sand of the Florida panhadle, but you still need something down between you and the mat to stay sand free. Benefits are that is is super light and it is easy to shake the sand off when it is time to leave.
customer_reviews.author: incoherent guru

customer_reviews.title: thin
customer_reviews.text: I have more than one sand mat, this is a back up for me at the beach, this one however is very light and very thin. Sounds good I know, but if you have used any of the original sand mats you will definitely see the down side. If you haven't enjoy. Get long pegs to push into the beach sand, the ones they give you will pull right of loose beach sand.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great sand free beach mat
customer_reviews.text: We are at the beach right now and this mat is GREAT!! The sand literally just falls through but sand doesn’t come up through the mat. I am so so so glad I purchased by this. It is great quality and is holding up even with everyone walking and sitting on it.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Handy for convenience sake
customer_reviews.text: After reading the review I thought i would give this a try. The 79x79 is said to fit 4-6 people, it can in fact fit 4 adults but there isn’t any extra space for other things such as bags and shoes and such(bummer maybe a larger one would). Aside from that it fits its purpose for putting down towels on top to keep sand off of them.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: Not Work
customer_reviews.text: At first, it send the wrong one to me. The seller was nice to give me the correct one. However, it is not work. Sand still everywhere. I just have to deal with sand then.
customer_reviews.author: 2th*

customer_reviews.title: I was a hit at the beach
customer_reviews.text: It works well!! It’s not the softest thing on earth, but it does what it’s supposed to!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Yoswa

customer_reviews.title: Itchy
customer_reviews.text: Two problems:1. the material is rough on the skin so a beach towel is still required. 2. the same holes that let sand go down, let sand go up.
customer_reviews.author: sfrost

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the beach!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for two beach towels with lingering room! Amazing solution to sand getting everywhere and easy to fold up and due to the design...no sand sprays your beach neighbors!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Best beach option
customer_reviews.text: This was so useful at the beach kept the sand and water off of us when we sat down easy to travel with! We even used it to watch the fireworks for the 4th of July!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Larusso

customer_reviews.title: No annoying sand on blanket!!
customer_reviews.text: This works great!! Nice size! No sand on my blanket!!
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This sand “free” mat is a total waste of money. Sand doesn’t just go down but it comes UP through the blanket. Might as well be sitting directly in the sand. Going straight in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinefinder

customer_reviews.title: Itchy
customer_reviews.text: It did what it said it would by letting the sand sink through but it also allowed sand to come up. The thing we were most disappointed by was that it’s not a blanket but rather a big plastic woven mat. It wasn’t comfortable so we placed our towels over it. It feels like those old reusable shopping bags that were plaid and itchy. We didn’t open it til we were actually on the beach and had we looked at it before, I probably would have returned it because of the material.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I like the size, blue color, corner pegs, and carrying bag. I like picking it up and it’s dry and clean. Keeps my beach towel cleaner. Also helps keep bugs out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blanket for what it claims to do, which is "sand free". Well that is not at all the case. Fact is when you sit on it sand comes up through the bottom and still manages to get all over you and everything you bring to the beach. Wouldn't recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It helps keeep the sand out of the tent for sure!!! Its like a foot mat also need to invest in some deep sea diving sucks keeps you from burning your feet in the sand
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Great overall blanket to keep most sand out
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good overall. Took this to Crystal Beach near Galveston. It does help keep the sand off pretty good but larger things like shells and rocks would always end up on the blanket. We used it as a mat under our tent and worked really well.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Sand comes up from the bottom
customer_reviews.text: I think this would be almost perfect if the sand did not come up through the mat. Sand does fall through the mat too so it is better than just putting towel down on the beach but still not quite what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: kkkokop

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome beach mat. Does as advertised. Comes with corner anchors to hold mat in place.. You will need to lay on top of a towel because mat alone will get uncomfortable. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhh order if you’re desperate for a beach blanket
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be more of a blanket. It’s just 2 layers of weird fabric. Smaller than I thought it would be. Can’t fit 2 people. Not worth it! You need to lay on your towel on top of this.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Mess free and lightweight beach blanket
customer_reviews.text: We bought this before our family Beach vacation. We we're thrilled with this blanket! We were able to sit on it without having sand stuck to us. It's super lightweight and easy to put down with the pegs...no more towels and blankets blown away in the wind, and no more shaking sand off into people's faces!
customer_reviews.author: Jmom

customer_reviews.title: large and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad to receive this blanket on time, so eventually we were able to go to beach yesterday and enjoy the sun, water again. This mesh blanket is very large, we have 7 ppl total went together including kids and we still felt spacious. We did added a towel on top of that blanket to make it feels softener and comfortable. Also it is very lightweight and comes with a pouch which makes it easier to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: TONG WANG

customer_reviews.title: Great under your towel at the beach!
customer_reviews.text: Way better than I expected! Fit 2 towels nicely and the sand never piled up. I was very happy sitting at the beach while my little ones swam and played in the sand and it didn't collect on my towel!
customer_reviews.author: edward gross

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE :Easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: I brought this item thinking that it would keep the sand somewhat at bay while at the beach but the sand just accumulated and did not do as it was advertised, so I sent the item back. Although it is a very light weight product it is just not what I needed for the beach to the be sand free. I recommend this product if you're on a grass type surface.
customer_reviews.author: Kisha

product_meta.title: ABETER Sand Free Beach Mat Blanket Sand Proof Magic Sandless Sand Dirt & Dust Disappear Fast Dry Easy to Clean Waterproof Rug Avoid Sand Dirt and Grass Keep Everything Clean
feature_bullets: SAND FREE AND WATERPROOF: Sand & dust, water disappear from your clothes/body and eyes with our beach mat, adding a towel on this blanket would be more comfortable.

SUPERIOR CONVENIENT WITH CARRY BAG & ANCHORS: Our beach blanket is extremely durable, lightweight & folds into a small pocket, it's easy to sweep sand off, wash and quick dry. you will get a free carry bag and durable anchors as gifts, which is more convenient to carry and use.
MULTI-USES: It can be used as blanket / mat or sun / rain shelter for beaches, picnics, parks, family trips, open-air festivals, camping, hiking, fishing, other occasions and outdoor sports.
INTIMATE SERVICE: Dual layer mesh technology, it allows sand to fall straight through leaving the mat free from sand! Nobody likes sand all over their beach mat when they’re about to sun bath!

SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: If you are not satisfied with the quality of our beach blanket mat, (PLS CONTACT ABETER) we will exchange it with a free mat for you or you can get a full refund. we guarantee that you will not lose money for buying our products.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
